General.Name: IHS Holding Ltd
General.Description: IHS Holding Limited, together with its subsidiaries, owns, operates, and develops shared communications infrastructure in Nigeria, Sub-Saharan Africa, Latin America, and the Middle East and North Africa. It offers colocation and lease agreement, build-to-suit, inbuilding, small cell, fiber connectivity, and rural telephony solutions. The company serves mobile network operators, internet service providers, security functions, and private corporations. IHS Holding Limited was founded in 2001 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 Cathedral Piazza, London, United Kingdom, SW1E 5BP
